title: Boosting Cardano's DeFi
description: 今後6ヶ月の間にDeFiチームがCardano上でオープンファイナンスソリューションを構築/展開するように促すにはどうしたらいいでしょうか？

f6_assessments.q0:
A range of DeFi solutions aligns with the Cardano mission driving adoption of Cardano. This challenge is the successor to the Scale-UP Cardano's DeFi Ecosystem so there is no overlap with an existing challenge other than the challenge specific to Africa. DeFi is a critical feature for many Cardano users.
I strongly agree this challenge is critical to achieve Cardano's mission.
f6_assessments.q1:
The technical capability has already been shown in previous funding rounds. As for the community willingness to fund, the proposer makes the strong case, "When looking at the DeFi-related proposals that have been approved but not funded, we can see that there are 5 (1 funded by left-over funds , 3 in the Dapps & Integration challenge, and the last in the "Scale Up Cardano's DeFi Ecosystem" challenge). These 5 proposals added together requested around $260,000USD."
I strongly agree that the Catalyst community has the capacity to address the challenge.
f6_assessments.q2:
The success criteria are relevant to the challenge question.
The key metrics are relevant to the success criteria and measurable.  
I  strongly agree that the success criteria and suggested metrics are set correctly to measure progress in addressing the challenge.

importance: 重要なのは、Defi dAppsが世界中のユーザーに信頼性の高いオンデマンドの金融サービスを提供していることです。
success: DeFi on Cardanoのための競争的な環境で、プロトコル間の相互協力とコンポーザビリティの促進に重点を置いています。
